description:
The MPG Vital High-Rise Slim Pant Peached leggings are a great option for anyone who loves a sleek and flattering fit. These leggings feature a high-rise waistband that provides support and coverage, a slim leg that hugs your curves, and a peached finish that gives them a soft and smooth feel.

  • The leggings are made from nylon and spandex, which are breathable and stretchy fabrics that can keep you cool and comfortable
  • They have four-way stretch, moisture-wicking, and anti-odor properties, which make them ideal for active lifestyles
  • Whether you are hitting the gym, running errands, or lounging at home, the MPG Vital High-Rise Slim Pant Peached leggings are a versatile and stylish choice for any occasion
name: MPG Vital High-Rise Slim Pant Peached - Women's
